label.en: 24/25 S regular part 2 2 CP LT Eng
label.et: 24/25 K PÕ 2. osa 2 EAP LT Eng

description.en: The seminars take place during two semesters. The topics covered in the seminars and the corresponding homework have been planned in a way that support the students during their participation in the Industrial Master's Programme in IT and equip them with practical skills to manage their self-development during and after the program.
description.et: Seminarid toimuvad läbi kahe semestri. Seminarides läbitud teemad ja kaasnevad kodutööd on planeeritud nii, et need toetavad üliõpilasi  IT-tööstusmagistrantuuri programmi läbimisel ning annavad kaasa praktilised oskused, millega juhtida oma enesearengut ka edaspidises elus.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to support students participating in the Industrial Master's Programme in IT and provide the necessary abilities for them to complete it.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on üliõpilaste toetamine IT-tööstusmagistrantuuri programmi läbimisel ja selleks vajalike oskuste arendamine.

learning_outcomes.en: A student that has taken the course has:
developed their understanding and gained practical skills in topics such as self-management and -analysis, time management and focusing, creativity, coping with stress;
learning_outcomes.et: * arendanud oma arusaamasid ning saanud praktilisi oskuseid teemadel nagu enesejuhtimine- ja analüüs, ajajuhtimine ja keskendumine, loovus, toimetulek stressiga

independent_work.et:
Homework 1: Preparations for coursework integration
Homework 2: Self-assessment and reflection
Homework 3: My possibilities for becoming a product manager
Homework 4: Progress interview

description.et:
-Participation in the seminars (5 out of 6, missing seminars will be replaced with extra homework)
- 5 self-reflection papers (presented within 1 week of each seminar, except the last)
-Final self-assessment (done in the final seminar)

grade_preconditions.et: Student has participated all seminars and submitted homework on time

grade_evaluation.et:
Üliõpilane on seminari läbinud, kui ta on
* osalenud kõikidel seminaridel
* esitanud kõik kodutööd tähtajaks
* esitatud kodutööd vastavad vähemalt esitatud miinimumnõuetele


The student has passed the course if they fill the following requirements:
* participated in all seminars
* submitted all homework tasks by the deadline
* all homework tasks correspond to the minimum requirements set

The assessment criteria for each homework task are provided at the seminar with a detailed description of the task.

debt_elimination.et: Possibilities for the overdue work submissions are decided case-by-case

resources.mandatory_materials: Mandatory materials will be presented in Moodle.

audience.et: Doctoral students, Industrial masters program in IT students
